Subject: Inquiry Regarding Command for Manually Updating EndpointProtector Client Policy on Linux CLI
Description:
Hello, 

I am currently using EndpointProtector and have installed the EndpointProtector Client on Ubuntu 24.04 running through WSL in a Windows environment.

I need to retrieve the policy from the server, but instead of relying on automatic policy updates, I am looking for a command that allows me to manually update the policy via CLI.

Could you confirm if such a command exists? If so, please provide the exact command for this process.

Thank you.
What_We_Know__c: ASked if there is a CLI command to update policiese.
Next_Steps__c: Asked customer to try restarting the service.
